Create_and_Manage_Letters_Templates_List.text: Create and Manage Letters Templates List

help_step.name: tour_1
help_step.text: Click to view the Layout list

help_step.name: tour_2
help_step.text: Click to add the new letter

help_step.name: tour_3
help_step.text: Select letter group to filter the letter templates

help_step.name: tour_5
help_step.text: Click the print icon to view the sample letter

help_step.name: tour_6
help_step.text: Click the edit icon to edit letter template

help_step.name: tour_7
help_step.text: Click the dub icon to duplicate the letter template

help_step.name: tour_8
help_step.text: Click the delete icon to delete the record
